draft.name: EXT_clip_cull_distance

contributors.contributor: Members of the WebGL working group

addendum.p: WebGL implementations can return 0 for the maximum number cull planes (MAX_CULL_DISTANCES_EXT) supported.

features.feature: Adds support for hardware clip planes and cull distances to OpenGL ES.

revision.change: Added addendum that allows for the number of cull planes to be 0.
